remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow1 .  The function ` .(+) ` is a group action on ` S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow1.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
sylow1.f $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow1.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
sylow1.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
sylow1.d $e |- ( ph -> ( P ^ N ) || ( # ` X ) ) $.
sylow1lem.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow1lem.s $e |- S = { s e. ~P X | ( # ` s ) = ( P ^ N ) } $.
sylow1lem.m $e |- .(+) = ( x e. X , y e. S |-> ran ( z e. y |-> ( x .+ z ) ) ) $.
sylow1lem2 $p |- ( ph -> .(+) e. ( G GrpAct S ) ) $.
$d .(+) x y z $.
$d .+ s x y z $.
$d G s x y z $.
$d N s x y z $.
$d P s x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d X s x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
